en.title: Master of Science (MSc) in Computer Science – Data Science
en.text: Graduate program focused on data science, machine learning, and computational problem-solving with applications in business analytics and data-driven decision-making.
list: Core Focus: statistical modeling, predictive analytics, and business intelligence
Advanced Topics: machine learning, natural language processing (NLP), cloud computing, and data pipelines
Technical Stack: Python, SQL, Power BI, Tableau, and data visualization/dashboarding
Professional Skills: business statistics, project management, professional communication, presentation skills, and DEI implementation

en.title: Bachelor of Engineering (BE) in Computer Science
en.text: Undergraduate program in computer science emphasizing programming, databases, software engineering, and data-driven systems development.
list: Grade: 89% (First Class with Distinction) – Bachelor’s degree
Core Coursework: algorithms & data structures, DBMS, software engineering, operating systems, and computer networks
Programming Languages: Python, C/C++, Java, SQL, and web development fundamentals
Foundational Skills: data analysis, project management, professional communication, and cloud computing basics
Capstone & Applied Projects: machine learning systems, web-based applications, and data analysis tools
